mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOTEL (HOTELNAME, HOTELIMG, HID, UNAME, HADDR,HAREA, HOTELINFO, MAP) VALUES (#{hotelname}, #{hotelimg}, #{hid}, #{uname}, #{haddr}, #{harea}, #{hotelinfo}, #{map})
INSERT INTO ROOM(ROOMTYPE, ROOMIMG,PRICE, HSEQ) VALUES (#{roomtype},#{roomimg},#{price},#{hseq})
INSERT INTO COMMENTS(HCOMMENTS,RATING, UID, HSEQ) VALUES (#{hcomments}, #{rating}, #{uid}, #{hseq})
INSERT INTO RESERVATION (INDATE, OUTDATE, UID, RSEQ, HSEQ, PRICE) VALUES (#{indate}, #{outdate}, #{uid}, #{rseq}, #{hseq}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT d.* FROM (SELECT a.PRICE , a.HOTELNAME, a.HSEQ, b.HOTELIMG, b.RATING, b.HADDR, a.RSEQ FROM (SELECT MIN(r.PRICE) PRICE, h.HOTELNAME, r.HSEQ, r.RSEQ FROM HOTEL h JOIN ROOM r ON h.HSEQ = r.HSEQ GROUP BY HSEQ) a JOIN (SELECT ROUND(AVG(c.RATING)*1,2) RATING, h.HSEQ, h.HOTELNAME, h.HOTELIMG, h.HADDR FROM HOTEL h JOIN COMMENTS c JOIN ROOM r ON c.HSEQ = h.HSEQ = r.HSEQ GROUP BY HSEQ ORDER BY RATING DESC)b ON a.HSEQ = b.HSEQ) d ORDER BY d.RATING DESC;

SELECT d.* FROM (SELECT a.PRICE , a.HOTELNAME, a.HSEQ, b.HOTELIMG, b.RATING, b.HADDR, a.RSEQ FROM (SELECT MIN(r.PRICE) PRICE, h.HOTELNAME, r.HSEQ, r.RSEQ FROM HOTEL h JOIN ROOM r ON h.HSEQ = r.HSEQ GROUP BY HSEQ) a JOIN (SELECT ROUND(AVG(c.RATING)*1,2) RATING, h.HSEQ, h.HOTELNAME, h.HOTELIMG, h.HADDR FROM HOTEL h JOIN COMMENTS c JOIN ROOM r ON c.HSEQ = h.HSEQ = r.HSEQ GROUP BY HSEQ ORDER BY RATING DESC)b ON a.HSEQ = b.HSEQ) d ORDER BY d.PRICE;
SELECT h.HSEQ, r.ROOMTYPE, h.HOTELNAME, h.HOTELINFO, r.PRICE,r.ROOMIMG, r.RSEQ FROM HOTEL h JOIN ROOM r ON h.HSEQ = r.HSEQ WHERE h.HSEQ LIKE #{hseq};
SELECT * FROM COMMENTS c JOIN HOTEL h ON c.HSEQ = h.HSEQ WHERE h.HSEQ LIKE #{hseq};
SELECT * FROM HOTEL WHERE HAREA LIKE #{harea} ORDER BY HSEQ DESC;

SELECT d.* FROM (SELECT a.PRICE , a.HOTELNAME, a.HSEQ, b.HOTELIMG, b.RATING, b.HADDR, b.HAREA FROM (SELECT MIN(r.PRICE) PRICE, h.HOTELNAME, r.HSEQ FROM HOTEL h JOIN ROOM r ON h.HSEQ = r.HSEQ GROUP BY HSEQ) a JOIN (SELECT ROUND(AVG(c.RATING)*1,2) RATING, h.HSEQ, h.HOTELNAME, h.HOTELIMG, h.HADDR, h.HAREA FROM HOTEL h JOIN COMMENTS c JOIN ROOM r ON c.HSEQ = h.HSEQ = r.HSEQ GROUP BY HSEQ ORDER BY RATING DESC)b ON a.HSEQ = b.HSEQ) d WHERE d.HAREA LIKE #{harea} ORDER BY RATING DESC;
